General.Name: Sam Engineering Equipment
General.Description: SAM Engineering & Equipment (M) Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the aerospace and equipment manufacturing businesses. The company is involved in the design, manufacture, and assembly of modular or complete machines and equipment; trims and form dies, and suspension tooling for hard disk drive parts; metal and non-metal ergonomic workstations and electronic products; automation equipment with equipment control software; computer process control system; and aircraft and other related equipment parts, spares, components and precision engineering parts. It offers dies, jigs, parts, and cutting tools for the disk drive, electronics, and semiconductors; and fabricates precision tools and machinery parts. The company operates in Malaysia, the rest of Asia, North America, Latin America, and Europe. The company was formerly known as LKT Industrial Berhad and changed its name to SAM Engineering & Equipment (M) Berhad in September 2010. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Penang, Malaysia. SAM Engineering & Equipment (M) Berhad is a subsidiary of Singapore Aerospace Manufacturing Pte. Ltd.
